titleStmt.title: A compendious view of the late tumults & troubles in this kingdom by way of annals for seven years viz, from the beginning of the 30th to the end of the 36th year of the reign of His Late Majesty King Charles II of blessed memory / by J.W. Esq.
titleStmt.author: Wright, James, 1643-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edw. Jones, for S. Lownds ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by James Wright. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
This work appears at reel 678:20 and reel 905:15. The copy on reel 905:15 is incorrectly identified in the reel guide as Wing W49: A coat of divers colovrs fit for Joseph, by J.W.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
